title: 免费领游戏：steam喜加9，Epic喜加3，Uplay喜加一，Google Play喜加一
author: zyjking
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zyjking 于 2020-3-27 15:24 编辑 

内容来自网上整合（keylol，steamdb，驰游公众号）

steam喜加九：
100% Orange Juice：https://store.steampowered.com/app/282800/
200% Mixed Juice!：https://store.steampowered.com/app/335190/
Acceleration of SUGURI 2：https://store.steampowered.com/app/390710/
Simple Story - Alex：https://store.steampowered.com/app/814200/
GOAT OF DUTY：https://store.steampowered.com/app/555000/
Project Mercury：https://store.steampowered.com/app/702150/
Nephise Begins：https://store.steampowered.com/app/628950/
Drawful 2：https://store.steampowered.com/app/442070/
Between Two Castles - Digital Edition：https://store.steampowered.com/app/1158500/
注意：免费领取的游戏不会掉落集换式卡牌


Epic Games喜加三：
Wo233rld W233ar Z：https://www.epicgames.com/store/zh-CN/product/world-war-z/home
Figment：https://www.epicgames.com/store/zh-CN/product/figment/home
Tormentor X Punisher：https://www.epicgames.com/store/zh-CN/product/tormentor-x-punisher/home

Uplay喜加一：
Child of Light（光之子）：https://ubi.li/s9gCM

Google Play：
纪念碑谷2：https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ustwo.monumentvalley2
